channel.title: Game is not launching!
channel.description:
I downloaded BMS from the torrent mirror, I installed it, restarted steam, but then when I click play nothing happens :frowning:
PLEASE HELP!

item.title: Game is not launching!
item.dc:creator: sonickid101
item.description:
sonickid101:

I’m going to try deleting the Torrent files and the game and re-downloading and re-installing using official mirror source files. Since I’ve already deleted and re-downloaded Source SDK 2007 Files and verified them.

I just realized my Torrent file is around 3.07GB size and the file offered from modDB is 3.8GB could be some missing information from the torrent version.

Read full topic

item.title: Game is not launching!
item.dc:creator: sonickid101
item.description:
shaulbaarlev1:

I downloaded BMS from the torrent mirror, I installed it, restarted steam, but then when I click play nothing happens

PLEASE HELP!

I’m having same issue I have SDK Base 2007 Installed the game shows up in my steam library. Source SDK 2007 loads and runs the benchmark fine.

However running black mesa opens with a loading screen then crashes with window “hl2.exe has stopped working”
under that “A problem caused the program to stop working correctly.”

Crash dump attached
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T6_9_4C0.mdmp (82.1 KB)

Read full topic
